mapper.sql: payment_event.id id, payment_event.trade_no, payment_event.transaction_id, payment_event.time_end AS trade_time, payment_event.event_type, payment_event.buyer_email, payment_order.create_at AS order_time, payment_order.`status`, payment_order.draw_user_id, payment_order.pay_amount AS order_price, payment_order.order_no, payment_order.order_type, payment_order.pay_no, payment_order.trade_type, payment_order.pay_channel, trade_order.hb_code AS cash_coupon_code, trade_order.user_id AS coupon_buyer_id, trade_order.user_phone AS coupon_buyer_account, trade_order.score, trade_order.hb_discount, trade_order.rebate_discount, CASE WHEN left(ry_rpb.payment_order.order_no,1) = 4 THEN cart_form.buyer_id else order_form.buyer_id END as buyer_id, CASE WHEN left(ry_rpb.payment_order.order_no,1) = 4 THEN cart_form.rebate_code else order_detail_form.coupon_id END as coupon_code, CASE WHEN left(ry_rpb.payment_order.order_no,1) = 4 THEN cart_form.discount_info else order_form.discount_info END as order_discount_info, CASE WHEN left(ry_rpb.payment_order.order_no,1) = 4 and cart_form.rebate_type >= 0 THEN 0 WHEN left(ry_rpb.payment_order.order_no,1) = 4 and cart_form.rebate_amount < cart_form.discount_amount and cart_form.rebate_type = -1 THEN 1 WHEN left(ry_rpb.payment_order.order_no,1) = 1 and cart_form.rebate_type >= 0 THEN 0 WHEN left(ry_rpb.payment_order.order_no,1) = 1 and order_detail_form.coupon_id IS NOT NULL AND order_detail_form.coupon_id != '' THEN 1 WHEN payment_order.order_type = 1 and trade_order.rebate_code != '' and trade_order.hb_type = 0 THEN 0 WHEN payment_order.order_type = 1 and trade_order.hb_code != '' THEN 1 else -1 END as rebate_type

ry_rpb.payment_event AS payment_event LEFT JOIN ry_rpb.payment_order AS payment_order ON payment_event.out_trade_no = payment_order.pay_no LEFT JOIN ry_osm.order_cart_form AS cart_form ON payment_order.order_no = cart_form.order_no and left(payment_order.order_no,1) = 4 LEFT JOIN ry_osm.order_form AS order_form ON payment_order.order_no = order_form.order_no and left(payment_order.order_no,1) != 4 LEFT JOIN ry_osm.order_detail_form AS order_detail_form ON order_form.order_no = order_detail_form.order_no LEFT JOIN ry_trade.trade_order AS trade_order ON trade_order.order_no = payment_order.order_no
